four-poster-beds.Name: White Four Poster Bed - Curved Wooden Posts
four-poster-beds.Body:
White Four Poster Bed

"Allure"

White Wooden Four Poster Bed. Curved bed posts with beautiful bow feature where the bed posts meet at the canopy.

Oval floral linen upholstered headboard, slightly inset within a bent wooden framework, the upholstered  headboard protrudes giving real depth to the linen headboard .

The four posters footboard is a plain planked design, having a small vein detail along the centre and is mortice and tenoned to the bowed bed frame. This white four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding , these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Available in different colour finishes.
  • Choice of headboard fabrics.
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Choice of timbers
  • Handmade in England
  • Shipping information

     Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

    Order now and pay later

four-poster-beds.Name: Contemporary Four Poster Bed With Upholstered Headboard
four-poster-beds.Body:
Four Poster Bed  - Grey - upholstered headboard

Four Poster Bed with upholstered headboard. painted grey. Modish upholstered headboard that is covered in a fabric that has silvery tones which alter under different lighting. The headboard is set within the beds bowed framework and protrudes, enhancing the depth and quality of the upholstery. 

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Hand painted four poster bed
  • Hardwood bed frame & slats
  • Choice of paint shade
  • Choice of upholstery fabrics
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Hardwood, solid wood four poster
  • Mortice and tenon jointed side rails and bed frame
  • Bolt together bed frame, very strong
  • Solid wood sturdy bed slats with central support and adjustable foot 
  • Choice of timbers
  • Four poster sizes are - Double - King - Super king and bespoke sizes 
  • Handmade in UK
  • Last a lifetime                   

Order Now - Pay Later

Shipping information

Four Poster Bed with upholstered headboard. painted grey. Modish upholstered headboard that is covered in a fabric that has silvery tones which alter under different lighting. The headboard is set within the beds bowed framework and protrudes, enhancing the depth and quality of the upholstery. 

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Hand painted four poster bed
  • Hardwood bed frame & slats
  • Choice of paint shade
  • Choice of upholstery fabrics
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Hardwood, solid wood four poster
  • Mortice and tenon jointed side rails and bed frame

  • Solid wood sturdy bed slats with central support and adjustable foot 
  • Choice of timbers
  • Four poster sizes are - Double - King - Super king and bespoke sizes

  • Last a lifetime

four-poster-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed
four-poster-beds.Body:
Four Poster Bed                                                                               

Wooden four poster bed frame. Modern contemporary four poster bed design handmade in our UK workshop where quality is at the forefront of what we do. We specialise in making wooden four poster bed frames that will last a lifetime. This modern four poster is shown in solid pine and also a grey finish which is a painted hardwood. It has a sloping planked headboard, inset within the curved bed frame.

The beds base is bespoke made also, made from solid hardwood and 22mm thickness as we believe the beds base is an important structural part of the bed that is designed to last a lifetime.

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre of the painted four poster. It is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail from which drapes may be hung.

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Bespoke four poster bed frame can be painted in a range of colours
  • Can be made in oak, pine or painted hardwood
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Made in UK
Order Now - Pay Later
Shipping Information

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

four-poster-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Black
four-poster-beds.Body:
"Aflame"

Black Four Poster Bed, hand painted in solid hardwood, asymmetrical flame design, handcrafted in our own beds and furniture workshop in Derbyshire in the UK. 

Simple planked side rails and foot board having subtle vein groove detail along the centre which is mortice and tenoned into the curved bed frame.

Hardwood slatted bed using 22mm hardwood for the slats. We believe the bed base should be bespoke too as it is an important part of the bed structure made to last a lifetime.

The stylish headboard is inset within the beds framework and protrudes to enhance  its depth and quality. Upholstered in a modern multi toned silvery -  black fabric which alters under different lighting.

The bed is shown dressed with Handmade Linen bedding which can be purchased separately.

  • Painted four poster beds in a range of colours
  • Choice of upholstered headboards
  • High quality four poster that will last a lifetime
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Handmade from solid wood including oak, painted hardwood and pine
  • Made in England UK
Order Now - Pay Later

four-poster-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Golden Oak
four-poster-beds.Body:
Solid oak four poster bed shown in super-king size and hand finished in oiled oak to match the decor. This modern hardwood four poster bed is made by Abowed, we design and make our luxury modern heritage four poster beds that are  specially made for you to last a lifetime. We only use high grade solid wood to make this four poster bed frame. The four poster shown is finished in a type of oil that brings out the natural golden tones in the oak. The four poster bed in the photo was a special commission for a beautiful castle holiday home.

We use solid hardwood for the beds base also, we machine hardwood to 22mm thickness to make our slatted base which is very sturdy made to last a lifetime.

  • Solid oak four poster bed
  • Elegant modern luxury designer bed
  • Oiled oak with golden tones
  • Asymmetrical solid oak headboard
  • Characterful oak grain
  • Wooden four posters beds in Double - Kingsize - Super-king
  • Very well made four poster bed, will last a lifetime
  • Arrives in easy to assemble sections to assemble and dissemble
  • Very strong solid wood base
  • Mortice and tenoned solid hardwood bed frame, very sturdy 
  • Designer handcrafted four poster bed, handmade in UK

 Now - Pay Later

four-poster-beds.Name: Modern Solid Oak Four Poster Bed Frame
four-poster-beds.Body:
FLAME 

Modern solid oak four poster bed frame, handcrafted in Derbyshire. We love making beautiful tall imposing high post beds that will last a lifetime. 

The tall bed posts are handcrafted to reflect the shape of a flame, the Flame high post bed is made in our own Derbyshire workshop. Made in prime grade hand selected oak, hardwood slatted base of superior quality which is also bespoke to compliment this four poster bed.

We use specially selected oak and traditional woodworking techniques to make our Abowed solid oak four poster bed frames, quality is at the heart of our work. We just love working in wood to produce the most gorgeous , modern, stylish new four poster beds that will last a lifetime!

  • Made from Solid Oak machined in our workshop
  • Bespoke, unique , specially commissioned four poster bed
  • Handcrafted curved posts
  • Solid oak sloping plank headboard.
  • Choose single, small double, kingsize and superking & bespoke sizes
  • Handmade & hand finished
  • Very strong hardwood bed base having solid wood slats with adjustable feet
  • Mortice and tenonned side rails
  • Sturdy bolt together construction
  • Made to last a lifetime
  • The four poster bed is specially made for you by craftsman
  • Choice of natural or oiled finish, we can send you samples
  • Easy to assemble
  • Made in England, Great Britain

 Order Now -Pay Later

four-poster-beds.Name: Oak Four Poster Bed
four-poster-beds.Body:
Four poster bed, medium to darker oak finish. Handmade using prime grade oak and handcrafted in our own workshop in Derbyshire. This unique four poster is of superior quality. It is hand finished so it has dark to medium oak tones overall although the wood grain is a much darker feature and blends perfectly with darker beams, flooring or furniture.

This bespoke four poster is made specially for you to order. Please call or email us to discuss your very special new bed. 

  • Dark oak four poster bed
  • Prime grade hand selected oak
  • Bent wooden bed posts, curved bed design by wood bending
  • Dark oak grain with lighter medium oak tones overall
  • Asymmetrical solid oak headboard
  • Asymmetrical posts
  • Characterful oak grain
  • We can make you this four poster in Double - Kingsize - Super-king
  • Very well made to last a lifetime
  • Flat packs, easy to assemble and dissemble
  • Hardwood bed slats, luxurious bed base 
  • Mortice and tenoned solid wood bed frame, very sturdy that bolts together 
  • Designer handcrafted four poster bed, handmade in UK

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Four Poster Bed
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Four Poster Bed                                                                               

Wooden four poster bed frame. Modern contemporary four poster bed design handmade in our UK workshop where quality is at the forefront of what we do. We specialise in making wooden four poster bed frames that will last a lifetime. This modern four poster is shown in solid pine and also a grey finish which is a painted hardwood. It has a sloping planked headboard, inset within the curved bed frame.

The beds base is bespoke made also, made from solid hardwood and 22mm thickness as we believe the beds base is an important structural part of the bed that is designed to last a lifetime.

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre of the painted four poster. It is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail from which drapes may be hung.

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Bespoke four poster bed frame can be painted in a range of colours
  • Can be made in oak, pine or painted hardwood
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Made in UK
Order Now - Pay Later
Shipping Information

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: White Four Poster Bed - Curved Wooden Posts
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
White Four Poster Bed

"Allure"

White Wooden Four Poster Bed. Curved bed posts with beautiful bow feature where the bed posts meet at the canopy.

Oval floral linen upholstered headboard, slightly inset within a bent wooden framework, the upholstered  headboard protrudes giving real depth to the linen headboard .

The four posters footboard is a plain planked design, having a small vein detail along the centre and is mortice and tenoned to the bowed bed frame. This white four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding , these can be purchased at extra cost.

shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Four Poster Bed  - Grey - upholstered headboard

Four Poster Bed with upholstered headboard. painted grey. Modish upholstered headboard that is covered in a fabric that has silvery tones which alter under different lighting. The headboard is set within the beds bowed framework and protrudes, enhancing the depth and quality of the upholstery. 

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Contemporary Four Poster Bed With Upholstered Headboard
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Four Poster Bed  - Grey - upholstered headboard

Four Poster Bed with upholstered headboard. painted grey. Modish upholstered headboard that is covered in a fabric that has silvery tones which alter under different lighting. The headboard is set within the beds bowed framework and protrudes, enhancing the depth and quality of the upholstery. 

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Solid oak four poster bed shown in super-king size and hand finished in oiled oak to match the decor. This modern hardwood four poster bed is made by Abowed, we design and make our luxury modern heritage four poster beds that are  specially made for you to last a lifetime. We only use high grade solid wood to make this four poster bed frame. The four poster shown is finished in a type of oil that brings out the natural golden tones in the oak. The four poster bed in the photo was a special commission for a beautiful castle holiday home.

We use solid hardwood for the beds base also, we machine hardwood to 22mm thickness to make our slatted base which is very sturdy made to last a lifetime.

The modern oak plank bed also has a specially made hardwood slatted bed base and central support rail which further adds to the quality..

Hand finished to retain the natural beauty of the oak, it's a simple oak plank bed in solid oak, handcrafted in Derbyshire by Abowed. The bed is very simple solid design, made to last a lifetime. We will happily send you samples so you can choose your wood finish.

  • Modern rustic solid oak plank bed
  • Oak footboard and side rails.
  • Rustic solid oak bed posts.
  • Solid pine wooden bed slats.
  • Made to last a lifetime.
  • Made in UK
  • Available in Double, Kingsize and Super-king.
  • Handmade to order
  • 10 year guarantee
  • Solid oak beds designed and made to last a lifetime.

 

Order Now - Pay Later

shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Modern Solid Oak Four Poster Bed Frame
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
FLAME 

Modern solid oak four poster bed frame, handcrafted in Derbyshire. We love making beautiful tall imposing high post beds that will last a lifetime. 

The tall bed posts are handcrafted to reflect the shape of a flame, the Flame high post bed is made in our own Derbyshire workshop. Made in prime grade hand selected oak, hardwood slatted base of superior quality which is also bespoke to compliment this four poster bed.

We use specially selected oak and traditional woodworking techniques to make our Abowed solid oak four poster bed frames, quality is at the heart of our work. We just love working in wood to produce the most gorgeous , modern, stylish new four poster beds that will last a lifetime!

  • Made from Solid Oak machined in our workshop
  • Bespoke, unique , specially commissioned four poster bed
  • Handcrafted curved posts
  • Solid oak sloping plank headboard.
  • Choose single, small double, kingsize and superking & bespoke sizes
  • Handmade & hand finished
  • Very strong hardwood bed base having solid wood slats with adjustable feet
  • Mortice and tenonned side rails
  • Sturdy bolt together construction
  • Made to last a lifetime
  • The four poster bed is specially made for you by craftsman
  • Choice of natural or oiled finish, we can send you samples
  • Easy to assemble
  • Made in England, Great Britain

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Arched Bowed - Bent Wooden Bed
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Arched Wooden Bed

Handcrafted arched wooden bed.  Hardwood bent wood bed frame  shown hand painted in off white. Bent wooden bed posts that have our beautiful cross over jointing feature where the bed posts meet. All our bed frames come with solid hard wood slats which are 22 mm in thickness which is a substantial bed slat to compliment our luxury bed frames. 

The twin wooden headboards are inset within the beds curved arched bed frame to ensure comfort.

The handmade bed has plain planked side rails and a footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. Hardwood solid slats. 

  • Painted Hardwood .
  • Very sturdy strong 22 mm hardwood slats 
  • Lifetime furniture 
  • Double, King & Super king plus bespoke bed frame sizes
  • Bed made in England UK
  • Specially made for you
Order now - Pay Later

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

    Shipping information

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Four Poster Bed - Black
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
"Aflame"

Black Four Poster Bed, hand painted in solid hardwood, asymmetrical flame design, handcrafted in our own beds and furniture workshop in Derbyshire in the UK. 

Simple planked side rails and foot board having subtle vein groove detail along the centre which is mortice and tenoned into the curved bed frame.

Hardwood slatted bed using 22mm hardwood for the slats. We believe the bed base should be bespoke too as it is an important part of the bed structure made to last a lifetime.

The stylish headboard is inset within the beds framework and protrudes to enhance  its depth and quality. Upholstered in a modern multi toned silvery -  black fabric which alters under different lighting.

The bed is shown dressed with Handmade Linen bedding which can be purchased separately.

  • Painted four poster beds in a range of colours
  • Choice of upholstered headboards
  • High quality four poster that will last a lifetime
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Handmade from solid wood including oak, painted hardwood and pine
  • Made in England UK
Order Now - Pay Later 
Shipping Information
Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Simple Wooden White Planked Bed
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Simple white planked bed with horizontal wooden planked headboard and foot board. Rustic plank bed design although with a modern approach having smooth texture, clean modern finish and made using a quality hardwood that paints up lovely and smooth.

This plain plank bed comes with solid hardwood slats that we make ourselves  which adds further to the quality of the bed. 

The bed posts are square, the beds side rails have a tenon at the end which slots into a mortice groove within the lower part of the bed post to the side rails and beds base is not relying just on the bed fixing which is a secret bolt that keeps the rail tightly sitting in the groove.  

Order Now - Pay Later

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Pine Planked Bed
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Rustic Pine Planked Bed
  • Modern Rustic plank bed
  • Chunky Solid  Pine 
  • Rustic but smooth finish
  • Handmade
  • Handcrafted bed, waxed finish
  • Strong bed frame
  • Sturdy base
  • Mortice & Tenonned
  • Bolted bed frame
  • Made in UK
  • Bespoke bed, specially made by furniture maker to order
  • 10 year guarantee
Lovely plain simple, modern rustic style planked bed. Our modern rustic style planked handmade bed has a tall headboard and contrasting lower footboard. Although the timber has a rustic appearance, it is nevertheless very smooth to touch giving a real quality feel to your bedand a slightly more modern style.
The chunky bedposts fix to the wooden siderails by mortice and tennon joints which are then bolted to secure. The chunky planked bed base is of a very strong design. It has wide wooden slats that sit in grooves and are screwed down to secure.
We use the same style and materials on all our bed bases , regardless of the model and price of the bed. We put a huge emphasis on building beds that have both strength and quality and making beds that will confidently last a lifetime.
This  handmade planked wooden bed is made in our own Derbyshire furniture workshop enabling us to make you any size bed you require. We specially make all the standard sizes along with more bespoke custom size beds for our customers, to fit any awkward space you may have.
Order Now - Pay Later

We use the same style and materials on all our bed bases , regardless of the model and price of the bed. We put a huge emphasis on building beds that have both strength and quality and making beds that will confidently last a lifetime.
This  handmade planked wooden bed is made in our own Derbyshire furniture workshop enabling us to make you any size bed you require. We specially make all the standard sizes along with more bespoke custom size beds for our customers, to fit any awkward space you may have.
Order Now - Pay Later

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Handmade Bowed Bed With Upholstered Headboard
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
"Serene"

 Handcrafted Contemporary Bed, shown hand painted in two shades of white. Bent wooden bed posts that have our beautiful cross over jointing feature where the bed posts meet.

The twin headboards are upholstered in a neutral linen fabric and are inset within the beds curved bed frame and protrude slightly to ensure comfort.

The handmade bed has planked side rails and a footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame.

The bowed bed is shown dressed with handmade linen bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Available in any Farrow & Ball colour
  • Choice of timbers
  • Choice of upholstery fabric
  • Handmade in England
Order Now - Pay Later

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

     

    Shipping information

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Oak Four Poster Bed
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Four poster bed, medium to darker oak finish. Handmade using prime grade oak and handcrafted in our own workshop in Derbyshire. This unique four poster is of superior quality. It is hand finished so it has dark to medium oak tones overall although the wood grain is a much darker feature and blends perfectly with darker beams, flooring or furniture.

This bespoke four poster is made specially for you to order. Please call or email us to discuss your very special new bed. 

  • Dark oak four poster bed
  • Prime grade hand selected oak
  • Bent wooden bed posts, curved bed design by wood bending
  • Dark oak grain with lighter medium oak tones overall
  • Asymmetrical solid oak headboard
  • Asymmetrical posts
  • Characterful oak grain
  • We can make you this four poster in Double - Kingsize - Super-king
  • Very well made to last a lifetime
  • Flat packs, easy to assemble and dissemble
  • Hardwood bed slats, luxurious bed base 
  • Mortice and tenoned solid wood bed frame, very sturdy that bolts together 
  • Designer handcrafted four poster bed, handmade in UK

shop-beds-furniture-now.Collection: Handcrafted Four Poster Beds & Luxury Bespoke Wooden Beds Makers
shop-beds-furniture-now.Name: Oak Floating Bed Frame
shop-beds-furniture-now.Body:
Oak Floating Bed

Solid oak floating bed with feature patchwork oak headboard.

This sleek floating bed frame appears to be a legless floating bed as the legs are hidden beneath the beds frame.  

We make our own strong hardwood bed slatted base using solid hardwood for extra sleep quality. 

The floating beds hardwood bed slats are jointed within a mortise and tenoned framework adding  extra strength to the minimalistic floating beds frame.

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed, we believe a bed should be a strong weight bearing structure to enjoy for many years and we have a buy once ethos. 

Our handmade beds are all designed to last a lifetime to be passed down as heirloom furniture. 

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed furniture workshop, all our beds and furniture are made by hand by ourselves.

Handmade specially for you !

handmade-beds.Name: Oak Four Poster Bed
handmade-beds.Body:
Four poster bed, medium to darker oak finish. Handmade using prime grade oak and handcrafted in our own workshop in Derbyshire. This unique four poster is of superior quality. It is hand finished so it has dark to medium oak tones overall although the wood grain is a much darker feature and blends perfectly with darker beams, flooring or furniture.

This bespoke four poster is made specially for you to order. Please call or email us to discuss your very special new bed.

handmade-beds.Name: Modern Solid Oak Four Poster Bed Frame
handmade-beds.Body:
FLAME 

Modern solid oak four poster bed frame, handcrafted in Derbyshire. We love making beautiful tall imposing high post beds that will last a lifetime. 

The tall bed posts are handcrafted to reflect the shape of a flame, the Flame high post bed is made in our own Derbyshire workshop. Made in prime grade hand selected oak, hardwood slatted base of superior quality which is also bespoke to compliment this four poster bed.

We use specially selected oak and traditional woodworking techniques to make our Abowed solid oak four poster bed frames, quality is at the heart of our work. We just love working in wood to produce the most gorgeous , modern, stylish new four poster beds that will last a lifetime!

  • Made from Solid Oak machined in our workshop
  • Bespoke, unique , specially commissioned four poster bed
  • Handcrafted curved posts
  • Solid oak sloping plank headboard.
  • Choose single, small double, kingsize and superking & bespoke sizes
  • Handmade & hand finished
  • Very strong hardwood bed base having solid wood slats with adjustable feet
  • Mortice and tenonned side rails
  • Sturdy bolt together construction
  • Made to last a lifetime
  • The four poster bed is specially made for you by craftsman
  • Choice of natural or oiled finish, we can send you samples
  • Easy to assemble
  • Made in England, Great Britain

 Order Now -Pay Later

Shipping Information

handmade-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Golden Oak
handmade-beds.Body:
Solid oak four poster bed shown in super-king size and hand finished in oiled oak to match the decor. This modern hardwood four poster bed is made by Abowed, we design and make our luxury modern heritage four poster beds that are  specially made for you to last a lifetime. We only use high grade solid wood to make this four poster bed frame. The four poster shown is finished in a type of oil that brings out the natural golden tones in the oak. The four poster bed in the photo was a special commission for a beautiful castle holiday home.

We use solid hardwood for the beds base also, we machine hardwood to 22mm thickness to make our slatted base which is very sturdy made to last a lifetime.

  • Solid oak four poster bed
  • Elegant modern luxury designer bed
  • Oiled oak with golden tones
  • Asymmetrical solid oak headboard
  • Characterful oak grain

  • Arrives in easy to assemble sections to assemble and dissemble

handmade-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Golden Oak
handmade-beds.Body:
Solid oak four poster bed shown in super-king size and hand finished in oiled oak to match the decor. This modern hardwood four poster bed is made by Abowed, we design and make our luxury modern heritage four poster beds that are  specially made for you to last a lifetime. We only use high grade solid wood to make this four poster bed frame. The four poster shown is finished in a type of oil that brings out the natural golden tones in the oak. The four poster bed in the photo was a special commission for a beautiful castle holiday home.

We use solid hardwood for the beds base also, we machine hardwood to 22mm thickness to make our slatted base which is very sturdy made to last a lifetime.

  • Solid oak four poster bed
  • Elegant modern luxury designer bed
  • Oiled oak with golden tones
  • Asymmetrical solid oak headboard
  • Characterful oak grain
  • Wooden four posters beds in Double - Kingsize - Super-king
  • Very well made four poster bed, will last a lifetime
  • Arrives in easy to assemble sections to assemble and dissemble
  • Very strong solid wood base
  • Mortice and tenoned solid hardwood bed frame, very sturdy 
  • Designer handcrafted four poster bed, handmade in UK

 Now - Pay Later

handmade-beds.Name: Oak Floating Bed Frame
handmade-beds.Body:
Oak Floating Bed

Solid oak floating bed with feature patchwork oak headboard.

This sleek floating bed frame appears to be a legless floating bed as the legs are hidden beneath the beds frame.  

We make our own strong hardwood bed slatted base using solid hardwood for extra sleep quality. 

The floating beds hardwood bed slats are jointed within a mortise and tenoned framework adding  extra strength to the minimalistic floating beds frame.

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed, we believe a bed should be a strong weight bearing structure to enjoy for many years and we have a buy once ethos. 

Our handmade beds are all designed to last a lifetime to be passed down as heirloom furniture. 

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed furniture workshop, all our beds and furniture are made by hand by ourselves.

Handmade specially for you !

handmade-beds.Name: White Four Poster Bed - Curved Wooden Posts
handmade-beds.Body:
White Four Poster Bed

"Allure"

White Wooden Four Poster Bed. Curved bed posts with beautiful bow feature where the bed posts meet at the canopy.

Oval floral linen upholstered headboard, slightly inset within a bent wooden framework, the upholstered  headboard protrudes giving real depth to the linen headboard .

The four posters footboard is a plain planked design, having a small vein detail along the centre and is mortice and tenoned to the bowed bed frame. This white four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding , these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Available in different colour finishes.
  • Choice of headboard fabrics.
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Choice of timbers

handmade-beds.Name: Contemporary Four Poster Bed With Upholstered Headboard
handmade-beds.Body:
Four Poster Bed  - Grey - upholstered headboard

Four Poster Bed with upholstered headboard. painted grey. Modish upholstered headboard that is covered in a fabric that has silvery tones which alter under different lighting. The headboard is set within the beds bowed framework and protrudes, enhancing the depth and quality of the upholstery. 

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Hand painted four poster bed
  • Hardwood bed frame & slats
  • Choice of paint shade
  • Choice of upholstery fabrics
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Hardwood, solid wood four poster
  • Mortice and tenon jointed side rails and bed frame
  • Bolt together bed frame, very strong
  • Solid wood sturdy bed slats with central support and adjustable foot 
  • Choice of timbers
  • Four poster sizes are - Double - King - Super king and bespoke sizes 
  • Handmade in UK
  • Last a lifetime

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard that has a simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail. 

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

handmade-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed
handmade-beds.Body:
Four Poster Bed                                                                               

Wooden four poster bed frame. Modern contemporary four poster bed design handmade in our UK workshop where quality is at the forefront of what we do. We specialise in making wooden four poster bed frames that will last a lifetime. This modern four poster is shown in solid pine and also a grey finish which is a painted hardwood. It has a sloping planked headboard, inset within the curved bed frame.

The beds base is bespoke made also, made from solid hardwood and 22mm thickness as we believe the beds base is an important structural part of the bed that is designed to last a lifetime.

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre of the painted four poster. It is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail from which drapes may be hung.

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Bespoke four poster bed frame can be painted in a range of colours
  • Can be made in oak, pine or painted hardwood
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Made in UK
Order Now - Pay Later
Shipping Information

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

Four Poster Bed                                                                               

Wooden four poster bed frame. Modern contemporary four poster bed design handmade in our UK workshop where quality is at the forefront of what we do. We specialise in making wooden four poster bed frames that will last a lifetime. This modern four poster is shown in solid pine and also a grey finish which is a painted hardwood. It has a sloping planked headboard, inset within the curved bed frame.

The beds base is bespoke made also, made from solid hardwood and 22mm thickness as we believe the beds base is an important structural part of the bed that is designed to last a lifetime.

The four poster bed has planked side rails and footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre of the painted four poster. It is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. The curved bed posts flow into point where the posts meet where both bed ends are connected by a top rail from which drapes may be hung.

The four poster bed is shown dressed with handmade linen drapes and bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

  • Bespoke four poster bed frame can be painted in a range of colours
  • Can be made in oak, pine or painted hardwood
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Made in UK
Order Now - Pay Later
Shipping Information

    Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

handmade-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Black
handmade-beds.Body:
"Aflame"

Black Four Poster Bed, hand painted in solid hardwood, asymmetrical flame design, handcrafted in our own beds and furniture workshop in Derbyshire in the UK. 

Simple planked side rails and foot board having subtle vein groove detail along the centre which is mortice and tenoned into the curved bed frame.

Hardwood slatted bed using 22mm hardwood for the slats. We believe the bed base should be bespoke too as it is an important part of the bed structure made to last a lifetime.

The stylish headboard is inset within the beds framework and protrudes to enhance  its depth and quality. Upholstered in a modern multi toned silvery -  black fabric which alters under different lighting.

The bed is shown dressed with Handmade Linen bedding which can be purchased separately.

  • Painted four poster beds in a range of colours
  • Choice of upholstered headboards
  • High quality four poster that will last a lifetime
  • Quality drapes made to order
  • Handmade from solid wood including oak, painted hardwood and pine
  • Made in England UK
Order Now - Pay Later 
Shipping Information
Please get in touch if you require any samples to help you decide on paint colour, timber and fabric choice and we will be happy to help.

handmade-beds.Name: Four Poster Bed - Black
handmade-beds.Body:
"Aflame"

Black Four Poster Bed, hand painted in solid hardwood, asymmetrical flame design, handcrafted in our own beds and furniture workshop in Derbyshire in the UK. 

Simple planked side rails and foot board having subtle vein groove detail along the centre which is mortice and tenoned into the curved bed frame.

Hardwood slatted bed using 22mm hardwood for the slats. We believe the bed base should be bespoke too as it is an important part of the bed structure made to last a lifetime.

The stylish headboard is inset within the beds framework and protrudes to enhance  its depth and quality. Upholstered in a modern multi toned silvery -  black fabric which alters under different lighting.

The bed is shown dressed with Handmade Linen bedding which can be purchased separately.

  • Painted four poster beds in a range of colours
  • Choice of upholstered headboards
  • High quality four poster that will last a lifetime

handmade-beds.Name: Handmade Bowed Bed With Upholstered Headboard
handmade-beds.Body:
"Serene"

 Handcrafted Contemporary Bed, shown hand painted in two shades of white. Bent wooden bed posts that have our beautiful cross over jointing feature where the bed posts meet.

The twin headboards are upholstered in a neutral linen fabric and are inset within the beds curved bed frame and protrude slightly to ensure comfort.

The handmade bed has planked side rails and a footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame.

The bowed bed is shown dressed with handmade linen bedding, these can be purchased at extra cost.

handmade-beds.Name: Arched Bowed - Bent Wooden Bed
handmade-beds.Body:
Arched Wooden Bed

Handcrafted arched wooden bed.  Hardwood bent wood bed frame  shown hand painted in off white. Bent wooden bed posts that have our beautiful cross over jointing feature where the bed posts meet. All our bed frames come with solid hard wood slats which are 22 mm in thickness which is a substantial bed slat to compliment our luxury bed frames. 

The twin wooden headboards are inset within the beds curved arched bed frame to ensure comfort.

The handmade bed has plain planked side rails and a footboard with simple vein detailing along the centre and is mortice and tenoned into the bowed bed frame. Hardwood solid slats. 

  • Painted Hardwood .
  • Very sturdy strong 22 mm hardwood slats 
  • Lifetime furniture 
  • Double, King & Super king plus bespoke bed frame sizes
  • Bed made in England UK

handmade-beds.Name: Solid Oak Plank Bed
handmade-beds.Body:
Modern solid oak plank bed made using solid oak comprising solid oak bed posts, solid oak headboard made up of individual character oak vertical boards and also solid oak side rails.

The modern oak plank bed also has a specially made hardwood slatted bed base and central support rail which further adds to the quality..

Hand finished to retain the natural beauty of the oak, it's a simple oak plank bed in solid oak, handcrafted in Derbyshire by Abowed. The bed is very simple solid design, made to last a lifetime. We will happily send you samples so you can choose your wood finish.

  • Modern rustic solid oak plank bed
  • Oak footboard and side rails.
  • Rustic solid oak bed posts.
  • Solid pine wooden bed slats.
  • Made to last a lifetime.
  • Made in UK
  • Available in Double, Kingsize and Super-king.
  • Handmade to order
  • 10 year guarantee
  • Solid oak beds designed and made to last a lifetime.

 

Order Now - Pay Later

handmade-beds.Name: Simple Wooden White Planked Bed
handmade-beds.Body:
Simple white planked bed with horizontal wooden planked headboard and foot board. Rustic plank bed design although with a modern approach having smooth texture, clean modern finish and made using a quality hardwood that paints up lovely and smooth.

This plain plank bed comes with solid hardwood slats that we make ourselves  which adds further to the quality of the bed. 

The bed posts are square, the beds side rails have a tenon at the end which slots into a mortice groove within the lower part of the bed post to the side rails and beds base is not relying just on the bed fixing which is a secret bolt that keeps the rail tightly sitting in the groove.  

Order Now - Pay Later

The bed posts are square, the beds side rails have a tenon at the end which slots into a mortice groove within the lower part of the bed post to the side rails and beds base is not relying just on the bed fixing which is a secret bolt that keeps the rail tightly sitting in the groove.  

Order Now - Pay Later

  • Modern Rustic plank bed
  • Chunky Solid  Pine 
  • Rustic but smooth finish
  • Handmade

  • Strong bed frame
  • Sturdy base
  • Mortice & Tenonned
  • Bolted bed frame
  • Made in UK
  • Bespoke bed, specially made by furniture maker to order
  • 10 year guarantee
Lovely plain simple, modern rustic style planked bed. Our modern rustic style planked handmade bed has a tall headboard and contrasting lower footboard. Although the timber has a rustic appearance, it is nevertheless very smooth to touch giving a real quality feel to your bedand a slightly more modern style.
The chunky bedposts fix to the wooden siderails by mortice and tennon joints which are then bolted to secure. The chunky planked bed base is of a very strong design. It has wide wooden slats that sit in grooves and are screwed down to secure.
We use the same style and materials on all our bed bases , regardless of the model and price of the bed. We put a huge emphasis on building beds that have both strength and quality and making beds that will confidently last a lifetime.
This  handmade planked wooden bed is made in our own Derbyshire furniture workshop enabling us to make you any size bed you require. We specially make all the standard sizes along with more bespoke custom size beds for our customers, to fit any awkward space you may have.
Order Now - Pay Later

oak-contemporary-bedside-cabinets.Body:
Beautiful bespoke bedside cabinets. One single drawer that is dove tail jointed. Curved bent legs  that match our unique curved four poster beds. This bedside cabinet has an elegant design.

Having fine curved wooden legs. Made from prime solid oak in an extremely light oak finish although we can finish your new bedroom  furniture to suit your space as everything is handmade in our workshop in England UK. We are proud to make top quality bedroom furniture. We can add drawers and any style of knob or handle to your bespoke bedside cabinet to create a unique cabinet specially for you. Also take a look at our hand crafted four poster beds that we make.

handmade-stools.Name: Rustic Old Oak Stool
handmade-stools.Body: Old oak antique stool with slatted shelf beneath. Characterful rustic knots and splits, very aged appearance although the stool is brand new. Can be used in the kitchen, bathroom, bedroom side tables or an occasional stool seat. Available in different finishes, just let us know which finish you prefer .

rustic-beds-furniture.Name: Solid Oak Plank Bed
rustic-beds-furniture.Body:
Modern solid oak plank bed made using solid oak comprising solid oak bed posts, solid oak headboard made up of individual character oak vertical boards and also solid oak side rails.

The modern oak plank bed also has a specially made hardwood slatted bed base and central support rail which further adds to the quality..

Hand finished to retain the natural beauty of the oak, it's a simple oak plank bed in solid oak, handcrafted in Derbyshire by Abowed. The bed is very simple solid design, made to last a lifetime. We will happily send you samples so you can choose your wood finish.

  • Modern rustic solid oak plank bed
  • Oak footboard and side rails.
  • Rustic solid oak bed posts.
  • Solid pine wooden bed slats.
  • Made to last a lifetime.
  • Made in UK
  • Available in Double, Kingsize and Super-king.
  • Handmade to order
  • 10 year guarantee
  • Solid oak beds designed and made to last a lifetime.

 

Order Now - Pay Later

The bed posts are square, the beds side rails have a tenon at the end which slots into a mortice groove within the lower part of the bed post to the side rails and beds base is not relying just on the bed fixing which is a secret bolt that keeps the rail tightly sitting in the groove.  

Order Now - Pay Later

rustic-beds-furniture.Name: Oak Floating Bed Frame
rustic-beds-furniture.Body:
Oak Floating Bed

Solid oak floating bed with feature patchwork oak headboard.

This sleek floating bed frame appears to be a legless floating bed as the legs are hidden beneath the beds frame.  

We make our own strong hardwood bed slatted base using solid hardwood for extra sleep quality. 

The floating beds hardwood bed slats are jointed within a mortise and tenoned framework adding  extra strength to the minimalistic floating beds frame.

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed, we believe a bed should be a strong weight bearing structure to enjoy for many years and we have a buy once ethos. 

Our handmade beds are all designed to last a lifetime to be passed down as heirloom furniture. 

We don’t believe in style over substance at Abowed furniture workshop, all our beds and furniture are made by hand by ourselves.

Handmade specially for you !
